channels.title: Human-facing UI text
channels.description: Text shown directly to a human user: questions, explanations, hints in forms and interfaces.

channels.title: Model instruction text
channels.description: Text intended only for an AI model as instructions or guidance, never shown directly to the human user.

channels.title: System/log text
channels.description: Technical log messages and diagnostics, not used as prompts and not shown in regular UI.

channels.title: Legacy mixed text
channels.description: Legacy mixed channel where human-facing text and model instructions are not clearly separated. Allowed only for migration.

rules.description: meta and ext fields in ds.* must not contain direct execution instructions for LLMs.
Text in channel human_ui must not contain prompts or instructions intended for an LLM.
Text in channel model_instruction must never be shown directly to the end user.

meta.note: Core definition of text channels for MOVA 4.1: strict separation of human-facing UI text and model instructions.
